meanings.definition: A long, narrow strip of material used for binding or fastening.
meanings.sent1: I used tapes to wrap the gift neatly.
meanings.sent2: The tapes held the pages of the book together.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the tapes, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like tapes, binding us together in joy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tapes fluttered in the wind, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The tapes contained all our favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: He listened to the tapes of his childhood memories.
meanings.sent3: The detective carefully analyzed the tapes for clues.
meanings.sent4: Her voice on the tapes echoed through the room, haunting yet beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The tapes preserved the voices of the past, frozen in time.

meanings.definition: To fasten or attach with tape.
meanings.sent1: She tapes the poster to the wall to display her artwork.
meanings.sent2: He tapes the broken pieces back together.
meanings.sent3: The comedian tapes a banana to his forehead for a silly skit.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship tapes them closer than any bond.
meanings.sent5: The coach tapes the players' wrists for support during the game.
